${modID}:PowerID.NAME: Ultimate Power
DESCRIPTIONS: You are Very Cool and Strong.

${modID}:AcupressureWeakPower.NAME: 封穴 - 涌泉穴
DESCRIPTIONS: 伤害。 每层封穴减少1点伤害。

${modID}:AcupressureDeathPower.NAME: 封穴 - 死穴
DESCRIPTIONS: 层数达到10层时立即杀死目标。

${modID}:AcupressurePainPower.NAME: 封穴 - 疼痛穴
DESCRIPTIONS: 每当目标获得封穴 - 疼痛穴时，受到等同于封穴层数的伤害。
